flashlight.name: flashlight
flashlight.desc: A working flashlight in this endless darkness. Now I'll be able to see something.
flashlight.use_msg: You light up your flashlight. This will help you see in here...
flashlight.error_msg: I should preserve battery for a darker room.

crowbar.name: crowbar
crowbar.desc: Maybe I could use it as a weapon or at least open some doors. The cold metal...
crowbar.use_msg: You break the ruined door and can now enter it.
crowbar.error_msg: There are no rooms that would need this.

keycard.name: keycard
keycard.desc: This might come handy. The text is scraped off, but I can always try it everywhere.
keycard.use_msg: You try your keycard and... ... ... IT WORKS! Green light lit up and the door opened.
keycard.error_msg: There are no rooms that would need this.

c4.name: c4
c4.desc: A remote controlled bomb. Now this becomes interesting...
c4.use_msg:
You place the c4 on the door. And now everything is in my hands. 
I should take the remote from my inventory and blow it.
c4.error_msg: I don't want to waste it. I should use it on something bigger...

remote.name: remote
remote.desc: I can use this to blow the c4 up!! Just need to make sure to be safe.
remote.error_msg:
... ... ... ... does it work?? ... BOOOOOOOM!!! 
You blowed yourself up......

detonator.name: detonator
detonator.desc: This could come in handy. A detonator for blowing something up from distance.
detonator.error_msg: You can't use it by itself.

dynamite.name: dynamite
dynamite.desc: Now I need something that will detonate this.
dynamite.error_msg: You can't use it by itself.

tools.name: tools
tools.desc: Tools that were scattered around. There were duplicates so I got a complete set.
tools.error_msg: You can't use it by itself.

box.name: box
box.desc: It was laying around all empty. A box for something. It has a red handle and looks used.
box.error_msg: You can't use it by itself.

toolbox.name: toolbox
toolbox.error_msg: You can't use it here. Actually... I don't even know how to use these...

id.name: id
id.desc: An ID card of a ... The text is scraped off, the photo resembles a man.
id.error_msg: This can't be used as it is.

notes.name: notes
notes.desc: I don't understand any of this writing. It just doesn't make sense.
notes.error_msg: You can't use it by itself

folder.name: folder
folder.desc: A folder with a text 'LOGBOOK' on it. The text is a bit torn.
folder.error_msg: You can't use it by itself

logbook.name: logbook
logbook.desc: Contains lots of writing, but isn't readable for me.
logbook.error_msg: There's no way to use it here. It's just paper.

adrenaline.name: adrenaline
adrenaline.desc: A medicament for adrenaline. I shouldn't be relying on this... Hope I won't need this.
adrenaline.use_msg:
You use the adrenaline... It goes right into you and you ain't even sure what does it contain.
You gained some energy!
adrenaline.error_msg: I feel good now. I should use it later... Or maybe not.

soda.name: soda
soda.desc: I put my hand through the bottom of the vending machine and the only thing I got was this soda can.
soda.use_msg:
You pop it open and drink it.
You gained some energy!
soda.error_msg: I feel good now. I should use it later... Or maybe not.

radio.name: radio
radio.desc: A small radio device that was given to me by the mechanic. Maybe it will come in handy.
radio.error_msg: I turn it on and it gives me white noise that pulses. I can't use it here, underground...

cash.name: cash
cash.desc: Old banknotes that were once the center of life. Now they are meaningless...
cash.error_msg: Some time ago these meant a lot to me...

coins.name: coins
coins.desc: Old coins, that are now useless. At least for me...
coins.error_msg: Some time ago these meant a lot to me...
